scheme_name: Farm Power Supply Scheme (PM KUSUM - Uttar Pradesh)
description: Subsidized solar pump scheme for farmers registered with UP Agriculture Department under PM KUSUM Yojana for 2025-26, covering 40,521 solar pumps through e-lottery system.
target_beneficiaries: Farmers registered with UP Agriculture Department
Farmers in areas with inadequate grid power supply
benefits: 2 HP DC/AC surface pump: ₹98,593 total subsidy (State: ₹56,737 + Central: ₹41,856)
7.5 HP/10 HP AC submersible: ₹2,54,983 maximum subsidy
6% interest rebate (3% Central + 3% State) under Agricultural Infrastructure Fund for loan availed farmers

steps: Click on 'Book Solar Pump for Subsidy' link
Pay remaining amount after subsidy confirmation
